summary: Small change so that all female humanoid vampires will have fangs.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like that only male vampires had fangs and could not find a mod that added fangs to female vampires so I decided to have a go at it myself and this is what I came up with.
If anyone knows of another mod that adds fangs to female vamps just let me know and I will remove this one.


[B][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=3]Description:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
Small change so that all female humanoid vampires will have fangs.
[B][COLOR=#ffff00][SIZE=2]Works for both Dawnguard and Non-Dawnguard installations.[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[B][COLOR=#ffff00][SIZE=2]Note: This mod will only give fangs to true female vampires. Such as your character once she has changed into a vampire and any npc listed in the Creation Kit as a vampire race , such as nordvampire , imperialvampire etc.....This will not work on any companions unless they are flagged as one of the vampire races ....[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]




[B][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=3]Installation:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
Copy meshes folder to data folder


[B][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=3]List of my other mods[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

author: Acdale
